name: @another-ui/grid
description: Just another 12-column grid layout for React
author: Dan Nguyen <nghuudan@gmail.com>

scripts.build: rimraf dist esmodule && tsc -p tsconfig.dist.json && tsc -p tsconfig.esmodule.json && sass lib:dist --no-source-map -s compressed
scripts.test: echo "Error: run tests from root" && exit 1
